TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UIBarPositioningDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static UIKit.UIBarPosition GetPositionForBar (this UIKit.IUIBarPositioningDelegate This, UIKit.IUIBarPositioning barPositioning);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype UIKit.UIBarPosition GetPositionForBar(class UIKit.IUIBarPositioningDelegate This, class UIKit.IUIBarPositioning barPositioning) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Returns the position for after it has been added to the user interface.
